ComicInfo.Summary:
In a world gone boom, you can't just catch the next JetBlue flight to the cosmic dimensional gateway thingy down in Citrusville. Good thing Deadpool is calling in his old pal Professor Veronica for some help in arranging some transportation. Little does Deapool know that Veronica has been turned zombie thanks to some chomp-chomp action by Crusher Creel, the Absorbing Man. The reunion ends with a bang...and not a good kind.
Note: The cover is a homage and a parody of the music album cover of Nirvana's Nevermind.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:44:00. [CVDB219625]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Absorbing Man, Ashcroft, Bill, Agent of A.I.M., Cypher, Deadpool, Dr. Betty, Professor Veronica, Sub-Commander Blake, Zombie Deadpool
